message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
You're getting closer, but I still want a bit more. Let's meet in the middle again!
I'm not budging, you're getting low!
I'm willing to compromise again. Let's meet in the middle and make a deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving up!
I'm getting desperate, but I still want a fair deal. Let's make a last-ditch effort!
You're running out of time, I'm not going to give you much!
I'm making a last stand! I'll give you most of it, but I want something!
You're almost out of time, I'm taking what's left!
